message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.RO, cs.HC 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper deals with real-time multi-person motion capture using multiple video cameras, which is a core topic in computer vision. 
- cs.GR (Graphics) is also likely as the paper deals with 3D pose reconstruction, which is a common topic in graphics. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is another possible category as the paper deals with processing and analyzing multiple video inputs. 
- cs.RO (Robotics) is a possible category as the paper deals with tracking and analyzing human motion, which is relevant to robotics applications. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is also a possible category as the paper deals with capturing and analyzing human motion, which is relevant to human-computer interaction applications.
